body:
Day 10 - Manga 250*
Do I have to say anything?
1/10.
For today this is it. Until tomorrow, maybe.
My eyes fucking hurt after that 2/10
The blue makes it clash with the white background making it hard to see what's happening 3/10
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga.
